attributes.action: limit the speed of all motorbikes at manufacture to 60 mph and ban them from near side undertaking.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Too many motorbike riders are being killed by being driven at excessive speed and by overtaking on the near side or between lanes of traffic.

As they do not appear to have the ability to self govern this sort of activity and many see it as a challenge  there should be a statutory limitation.
